title: Tech News: A Mega Load of Meta News And More
itunes:title: Tech News: A Mega Load of Meta News And More
description:
Meta held its Q2 2022 earnings call and we learned a lot about what's going on with the company. We also learned that soon Meta will charge more for VR hardware and that it might be easing off on its misinformation policy. Plus news about Samsung, Google, Apple making a car and the next Grand Theft Auto game.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Meta held its Q2 2022 earnings call and we learned a lot about what's going on with the company. We also learned that soon Meta will charge more for VR hardware and that it might be easing off on its misinformation policy. Plus news about Samsung, Google, Apple making a car and the next Grand Theft Auto game.

itunes:keywords: Meta, Facebook, Instagram, AI, algorithm, recommendation, Reality Labs, mixed reality, metaverse, misinformation, COVID, Google, Android, Samsung, water resistance, false advertising, Apple, EV, electric vehicle, Tesla, Rockstar, GTA 6, Grand Theft Auto, video games, mental health
